titleStmt.title: The greatnes of the mystery of godlines; opened in severall sermons by Cuthbert Sydenham teacher to a Church of Christ at Newcastle upon Tine.
titleStmt.author: Sydenham, Cuthbert, 1622-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Hunt for Richard Tomlins, at the Sun and Bible neare Pye-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
